item.title: Gulbarga + Generation X lead pack
item.description: Total points: 4295. Avg points: 859.0. Delta vs demographic avg: +258.1. Signal: Generation X players born in Gulbarga are outperforming other location–generation mixes in this round. Fun fact – Gulbarga: Gulbarga, now Kalaburagi, was a key seat of the Bahmani Sultanate. Fun fact – Generation X: Gen X bridged the pre-digital and early-internet eras.

item.title: Thanjavur + Generation X lead pack
item.description: Total points: 7802. Avg points: 780.2. Delta vs demographic avg: +179.3. Signal: Generation X players born in Thanjavur are outperforming other location–generation mixes in this round. Fun fact – Thanjavur: Thanjavur was the Chola capital and is famed for Brihadisvara Temple. Fun fact – Generation X: Gen X bridged the pre-digital and early-internet eras.

item.title: Jaipur + Generation Z lead pack
item.description: Total points: 15405. Avg points: 770.2. Delta vs demographic avg: +169.3. Signal: Generation Z players born in Jaipur are outperforming other location–generation mixes in this round. Fun fact – Jaipur: Jaipur, the Pink City, was laid out with early modern urban planning. Fun fact – Generation Z: Gen Z is always-connected and highly visual in learning.

item.title: Rajahmundry + Millennial lead pack
item.description: Total points: 11540. Avg points: 769.3. Delta vs demographic avg: +168.4. Signal: Millennial players born in Rajahmundry are outperforming other location–generation mixes in this round. Fun fact – Rajahmundry: Rajahmundry on the Godavari is among Andhra’s oldest cultural hubs. Fun fact – Millennial: Millennials are the crossover generation for mobile + social.
